# TELESCOPE = JWST
# INSTRUMENT = ANY
DQFLAG SHORT_DESCRIPTION LONG_DESCRIPTION
0      "OK"              "Good pixel"
1      "DONOTUSE"        "Do not use"
2      "DEAD"            "Dead pixel or ADC saturated"
4      "HOT"             "Hot pixel or hard saturated"
8      "WARM"            "Warm pixel or soft saturated"
16     "LOWQE"           "Low QE or CR before"
32     "EARLYSAT"        "Early saturation or CR within"
64     "RC"              "RC or after CR"
128    "RESET"           "High reset or reset anomaly"
256    "UNDEF"           "Undefined"
512    "UNDEF"           "Undefined"
1024   "UNDEF"           "Undefined"
2048   "UNDEF"           "Undefined"
4096   "UNDEF"           "Undefined"
8192   "UNDEF"           "Undefined"
16384  "UNDEF"           "Undefined"
32768  "UNDEF"           "Undefined"
